metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40971 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability intemplates/installer/step-004.inc.php in spotweb 1.5.1 and below allowremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via thenewpassword1 parameter.

criterions.comment: spotweb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
